description: These simple prawn skewers are packed with flavour and can be cooked under the grill or on the barbecue.
name: Tandoori Prawn Skewers with Raita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add 4 tablespoons of the yoghurt to a large bowl and whisk in the garlic and ginger paste, half of the lemon juice, chilli and garam masala. Thread the prawns on to skewers and add to a shallow dish. Pour over the marinade, turn to coat each skewer, cover and leave to marinade for 30 minutes in the fridge.
Whisk the remaining yoghurt with mint, grated cucumber and the rest of the lemon juice and zest to make raita.
Pre-heat the grill to high. Brush excess marinade off the skewers and place them under the grill. Cook for 5-6 minutes, turning once. Serve with raita.
